search_parameters.q: Bruno Mars, age, music related skills + abilities + occupations, proficiency in each, and current residence location (city, state)

text_blocks.snippet: As of early 2026, here is the profile for the global music icon Bruno Mars:

list.snippet: Current Residence: Studio City, Los Angeles, California. He owns a Mediterranean-style mansion valued at approximately $7.5 million to $9 million. Rethinking The Future +3
Singer-Songwriter: Leading soloist and member of the duo Silk Sonic.
Record Producer: Co-founder of production teams The Smeezingtons and Shampoo Press & Curl.
Musician/Multi-instrumentalist: Plays multiple instruments on his own tracks and for others.
Dancer & Choreographer: Known for intricate stage routines and directing his own music video choreography.
Music Video Director: Co-directs the majority of his visual projects. Wikipedia +4

table: Master (3-octave tenor range). Renowned for "retro showmanship," vocal agility, and the ability to hit sustained high notes (C5–D5).
Professional. He famously performed a drum solo during the 2014 Super Bowl halftime show.
Advanced. Skilled in electric and acoustic guitar, often playing lead riffs during live performances (e.g., "Locked Out of Heaven").
Advanced. Typically uses piano or guitar to write his music; performed "When I Was Your Man" on piano.
Elite. Has written numerous #1 hits for himself and other stars like Adele, CeeLo Green, and Flo Rida.
Proficient. Also plays bass, ukulele, congas, and harmonica.
